is Realtek the wireless?: rtl8197 is not supported yet. i just checked the rtl8187 driver in kernel 2.6.24
the composite extension is blacklisted for that card. 3d accel works, but compiz additionally need the composite extension.
if 0bda:8197 is just another usb-id for the rtl8187 chipset, i should be enough to patch the id in the existing driver. but maybe it's a different chip, i don't know.
